data.scheme_name: Gramodyog Vikas Yojana  - Beekeeping Activity  - Existing
data.benefits: Under the scheme, 5 day beekeeping training would be provided to the beneficiaries.
data.eligibility: Artisans in the age group of 18 years to 55 years  having Aadhar Card/ Voter ID with photographs  and Ration Cards, etc.
data.conditions:
1. Persons who have availed benefits from other Govt. 
  2. Schemes for the same/similar purpose will not be eligible; the beneficiary shall give declaration to this effect.
data.beneficiaries: Artisans in the age group of 18 years to 55 years  having Aadhar Card/ Voter ID with photographs  and Ration Cards, etc.
data.prerequisites:
1. Persons who have availed benefits from other Govt. 
  2. Schemes for the same/similar purpose will not be eligible; the beneficiary shall give declaration to this effect.
data.context: The scheme aims to revive the Agarbatti industry in the country by increasing indigenous production of Agarbatti, thereby reducing imports.
data.objective:
1. To adopt scientific Bee Management practices 
  2. To utilize available natural resources in beekeeping 
  3. To create sustainable employments for the beekeepers/farmers 
  4. To provide supplementary income for /beekeepers/farmers 
  5. To create awareness about Honey and other Hive Products 
  6. To create awareness about the benefits of beekeeping in cross pollination
data.description:
1. 5 days beekeeping training is provided to the beneficiary through various Training Centres/State Beekeeping Extension Centres/ Mastersâ€™ Trainer as per prescribed syllabus. 
  2. Assistance with Bee boxes, Tool kits etc. 
  3. One person from one family will be eligible for 10 bee boxes, with bee colonies & tools kit (Bee veil, smoker, Knife and hive tool)
data.how_to_apply: The field offices to identify the beneficiaries by conducting the awareness camp/through advertisements.
data.funding_mechanism: Direct benefit of training to be provided to the identified beneficiaries.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Aadhar Card
2. PAN Card
3. Voter ID
4. Photographs
5. Caste certificate
data.checklist_info_d:
